article_title: India’s MX Player expands to US, UK and other markets in international push
article_description: MX Player  the on demand video streaming service owned by India s conglomerate Times Internet  is expanding to more than half a dozen new international markets including the U S  and the UK to supply more entertainment content to millions of people trapped in
article_content: MX Player  the on demand video streaming service owned by Indias conglomerate Times Internet  is expanding to more than half a dozen new international markets including the U S  and the UK to supply more entertainment content to millions of people trapped in    1985 chars
